snippet: The departure after three months in office, which the company said was for personal reasons, followed a profit warning in November.
lead_paragraph: The departure after three months in office, which the company said was for personal reasons, followed a profit warning in November.

headline.main: Chief of Rémy Cointreau Resigns After Slide in Demand From China
headline.print_headline: Chief Executive of Rémy Cointreau Resigns After Slide in Demand From China
